content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>Drupal API</ShortName>   <Description>Drupal API documentation</Description>   <Image width="16" height="16" type="image/x-icon">https://api.drupal.org/misc/favicon.ico</Image>   <Url type="text/html" rel="results" method="GET" template="https://api.drupal.org/apis/{searchTerms}" />   <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" rel="suggestions" template="https://api.drupal.org/api/suggest/{searchTerms}"/>   <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="https://api.drupal.org/api/opensearch" /> </OpenSearchDescription>
